projects.name: Vongo: Ticket Booking Management System
description: Developed a dynamic event ticket booking platform Named Vongo supporting 32 languages
Utilized technologies like Redux Toolkit, Next.js, Material-UI (Mui), Tailwind-Css for seamless user experiences.
Created custom sales pages and integrated them as Iframes for effective event promotion and ticket sales.
Tech Stack:- Node.js, Laravel, SQL, React.js(Next.js), MUI, TailwindCss, GitHub (Version Control).

projects.name: Assure-IT - Tickets Management System
description: Assure-IT is a robust ticket management system addressing client issues seamlessly.
Users can conveniently submit tickets across multiple platforms, which are then stored and reviewed by site managers. this project streamlines issue resolution for enhanced user experience.
Tech Stack:- PHP, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS

projects.name: CodeHive - Your Personal Code Management System & ToDo Platform
description: Store, organize and access your code snippets effortlessly, replacing text files.
The tailored dashboard, designed with Tailwind CSS, offers easy management of notes and tasks, functioning as a task manager.
Built with MERN stack, the site features user-specific dashboards, dark/light modes, and seamless registration-based login.
Tech Stack:- Node.js, Express.js, React.js(Next.js), MongoDb, Tailwind Css, GitHub (Version Control)

projects.name: Airbnb Clone
description: Airbnb Clone - A Next.js application replicating Airbnb's user interface and functionalities.
Developed through self-guided learning using YouTube resources, showcasing practical hands-on experience in web development.
Crafted with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB, and Prisma. Features OAuth integration for GitHub and Google authentication.

projects.name: ISCB (Indian Smuggling Control Bureau)
description: As part of my academic pursuits, I successfully completed a challenging and impactful project named ISCB (Indian Smuggling Control Bureau) that focused on developing a robust system to combat smuggling activities within our nation's borders.
The ISCB project not only allowed me to apply my technical skills in a real-world scenario but also provided a valuable opportunity to strengthen my collaboration and teamwork abilities.
Tech Stack:- Node.js, Express.js, React.js, MongoDb, MUI, GitHub (Version Control)
